package.description: This package contains TREX (initially developed at the Monterey Bay Aquarium Research Institute), and EUROPA from the NASA Ames Research Center. This package does not modify these 3rd party libraries in any way; it simply provides a convenient way to download and build the headers and libraries in a way that can be managed by the ROS dependency system.
package.author: Conor McGann, with contributions from many others. See respective projects.
